title: why are some peoples names coloured greena and yello in the boards when they arent rioters?

replies.body:
Because we're awesome!

Just kidding :D 
 
* Emissaries are green like me. I like to think of us as a tether or link between Riot and the community. 

 We're just here to answer some of the smaller questions, that Riot doesn't have time to look at. But we can also ask Riot for advice and help on bigger issues and posts.

 You can learn more about emissaries [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Edu7E6Bp-introducing-the-emissaries).

* Yellow is for Wrenchmen. I don't really know too much about their role, so I'll leave it to an actual Wrenchmen to explain. 

 You can read more about them [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/nE4lj5EB-introducing-the-wrenchmen) as well though.
Pretty much what telecaster said, except wrenchmen are here to help out with technical issues mainly. However we're all more than happy to help out wherever we can :)
Green is a new position just opened, such as Seras dragon's. They just help out lots on the boards so have been given a cool identifier, showing they can help with questions.
